topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558cd4df636872369f000ae8#post_558cd4df636872369f000ae8
Hellraiser is one of my favorites as well. Not as much as Texas or The Thing, but still a goddamn gloriously good time with some of the best make up and wonderfully effective practical effects I've ever seen.

The sequel is pretty damn good as well, even if it does go a touch too bananas at the very end. The other sequels though make me want to trick some executives into completing the Lament Configuration.
